      • annotationForwardIndex

        public AnnotationForwardIndex annotationForwardIndex(Annotation annotation)
        Description copied from interface: BlackLabIndex
        Tries to get the ForwardIndex object for the specified fieldname. Looks for an already-opened forward index first. If none is found, and if we're in "create index" mode, may create a new forward index. Otherwise, looks for an existing forward index and opens that.
        Specified by:
        annotationForwardIndex in interface BlackLabIndex
        Parameters:
        annotation - the annotation for which we want the forward index
        Returns:
        the ForwardIndex if found/created

      • termFrequencies

        public TermFrequencyList termFrequencies(AnnotationSensitivity annotSensitivity,
                                         org.apache.lucene.search.Query filterQuery,
                                         Set<String> terms)
        Description copied from interface: BlackLabIndex
        Determine the term frequencies for an annotation sensitivity.
        Specified by:
        termFrequencies in interface BlackLabIndex
        Parameters:
        annotSensitivity - the annation + sensitivity indexing we want the term frequency for
        filterQuery - document filter, or null for all documents
        terms - a list of terms to retrieve frequencies for, or null/empty to retrieve frequencies for all terms
        Returns:
        term frequencies

      • search

        public SearchEmpty search(AnnotatedField field,
                          boolean useCache,
                          SearchLogger searchLogger)
        Description copied from interface: BlackLabIndex
        Start building a Search.
        Specified by:
        search in interface BlackLabIndex
        Parameters:
        field - field to search
        useCache - whether to use the cache or bypass it
        searchLogger - where to log details about how the search was executed, or null to skip this logging
        Returns:
        empty search object

      • setCache

        public void setCache(SearchCache cache)
        Description copied from interface: BlackLabIndex
        Set the object BlackLab should use as cache. BlackLab will notify the cache of search results and will ask the cache for results before executing a search. It is up to the application to implement an effective cache, deciding whether to cache a result and ensuring the cache doesn't grow too large.
        Specified by:
        setCache in interface BlackLabIndex
        Parameters:
        cache - cache object to use
